rows.title: Resources
rows.message_text: This is a collection of teaching resources.

rows.title: Resource Finder
rows.message_text: This tool will find all the resources associated with a topic.

rows.title: Puzzles
rows.message_text: These are math puzzles divided into increasing levels of sophistication â€“ both in math content and in difficulty.

rows.title: Storybooks
rows.message_text: These storybooks are for an adult to read to a child. They have math comments and guiding questions on every page. Help your child grow mathematically and create strong associations of math with the happy, cozy experience of reading together!

rows.title: Routines
rows.message_text: This has 1 to 10-minute routines to do with your class. It has math talks, fluency tasks, and things like Which One Doesn't Belong?

rows.title: Rich Tasks
rows.message_text: This has 20-minute to multi-class tasks that allow more depth with multiple facets.

rows.title: Glossary
rows.message_text: This is a glossary of significant math vocabulary.

rows.title: Help
rows.message_text: If you ever want to see this introduction again, just click on the question mark.
